values: Koshien Stadium (baseball park in Nishinomiya, Hyōgo Prefecture)
National High School Baseball Tournament (held annually in August at Koshien Stadium)
National High School Baseball Invitational Tournament (held annually in March at Koshien Stadium)
Kōshien (Viertel in der Stadt Nishinomiya in der Präf. Hyōgo)
Kōshien-Baseballstadion (Heimatstadium der Hanshin-Tigers in Nishinomiya, Präf. Hyōgo; hier finden jährlich die Oberschulbaseball-Wettkämpfe statt)
